resources.string: Our Mission is to provide a user friendly interface for college students where they can access all major things required in their college education on a single platform.
Our vision is to make students much more focussed by reducing their load of checking different applications to access information related to their college education.

Our idea is to centralize all the important data related to classes, assignments, etc. on a single platform so as to increase the accessibility of data by college students, and thus reducing the chances of late submissions.
